card.name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
card.property: +1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. −3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn. −8: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens, where X is your life total.

card.name: Ajani's Sunstriker
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ajani goes where he is needed most and in his name we keep his lands safe."

card.name: Angel's Mercy
card.property: You gain 7 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She rose above me, and in that moment Varrik the Bloody died and I was born." —Varrik the Just

card.name: Angelic Benediction
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the bravest are worthy of our blessing."

card.name: Attended Knight
card.property: First strike When Attended Knight enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

card.name: Aven Squire
card.property: Flying Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the meek charge into battle, courage becomes infectious.

card.name: Battleflight Eagle
card.property: Flying When Battleflight Eagle enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eagles make fine mounts, but they're too proud to carry anyone for long.

card.name: Captain of the Watch
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. When Captain of the Watch enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Captain's Call
card.property: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who among you has the courage to face certain death? Who will heed my call?" —Rayel Vanger, Firstblade of Thune

card.name: Crusader of Odric
card.property: Crusader of Odric's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are Odric's sword. We strike without fear, for his mind has divined how our foe will be slain."

card.name: Divine Favor
card.property: Enchant creature When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.

card.name: Divine Verdict
card.property: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Erase
card.property: Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't trust your eyes, for mages are skilled in deception. Trust only in your faith. It will wipe everything clean." —Lila, Erunian priest

card.name: Faith's Reward
card.property: Return to the battlefield all permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I thought the wind was ushering me to my final destination, but it lifted me to my feet and I fought on." —Idrus, war priest of Thune

card.name: Glorious Charge
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One's blade is only as sharp as one's conviction." —Ajani Goldmane

card.name: Griffin Protector
card.property: Flying Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Griffin Protector gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The drums of war stir the hearts of all who fight for righteousness.

card.name: Guardian Lions
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Approach in peace or not at all.

card.name: Guardians of Akrasa
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only by the bravery of those who put loyalty above glory is our home kept safe." —Elspeth Tirel

card.name: Healer of the Pride
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No life is without meaning. No living thing is too small to be strong."

card.name: Intrepid Hero
card.property: {T}: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fool knows no fear. A hero shows no fear.

card.name: Knight of Glory
card.property: Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.) Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will uphold the law, and no manner of foe will stop me."

card.name: Oblivion Ring
card.property: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Odric, Master Tactician
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Whenever Odric, Master Tactician and at least three other creatures attack, you choose which creatures block this combat and how those creatures block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear holds no place in faith's battle plan."

card.name: Pacifism
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May starving fleas birth a thousand generations on your stubborn hide, cow!" —Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

card.name: Planar Cleansing
card.property: Destroy all nonland permanents.

card.name: Prized Elephant
card.property: Prized Elephant gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Forest. {G}: Prized Elephant gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Rain of Blades
card.property: Rain of Blades deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say they are the weapons of heroes fallen in battle, eager for one last chance at glory.

card.name: Rhox Faithmender
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rhoxes who live long enough to retire from war lend support with their extensive knowledge of combat injuries.

card.name: Safe Passage
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As she shepherds the faithful, the angel's radiance is a shield of salvation.

card.name: Serra Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

card.name: Serra Avatar
card.property: Serra Avatar's power and toughness are each equal to your life total. When Serra Avatar is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Serra isn't dead. She lives on through me."

card.name: Serra Avenger
card.property: You can't cast this spell during your first, second, or third turns of the game. Flying Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

card.name: Show of Valor
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Duty, honor, and valor are either in your heart or they are not. You will never know for certain until you are tested." —Ajani Goldmane

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the wild, white fur like mine is an aberration. We lack natural camouflage, but the inability to hide encourages other strengths." —Ajani Goldmane

card.name: Sublime Archangel
card.property: Flying Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Other creatures you control have exalted. (If a creature has multiple instances of exalted, each triggers separately.)

card.name: Touch of the Eternal
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, count the number of permanents you control. Your life total becomes that number.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Time is a vigilant tyrant, but there are those who have broken free of its gaze." —Laikas, Erunian monk

card.name: War Falcon
card.property: Flying War Falcon can't attack unless you control a Knight or a Soldier.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The falcon is the picture of nobility, maintaining a regal bearing even as it conducts the bloody business of war.

card.name: War Priest of Thune
card.property: When War Priest of Thune enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sacred might of Thune thunders in my soul."

card.name: Warclamp Mastiff
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One bite from that dog will send you to the healer's tent for days." —Watchmaster Finn of An Karras

card.name: Archaeomancer
card.property: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

card.name: Arctic Aven
card.property: Flying Arctic Aven gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains. {W}: Arctic Aven gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Augur of Bolas
card.property: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Battle of Wits
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 200 or more cards in your library, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no loftier ambition than the pursuit of knowledge.

card.name: Clone
card.property: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Courtly Provocateur
card.property: {T}: Target creature attacks this turn if able. {T}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My one regret is that I have mastered an art that leaves its audience unable to applaud."

card.name: Divination
card.property: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you." —Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

card.name: Downpour
card.property: Tap up to three target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sky holds vast oceans. They are at your fingertips if you know how to call them." —Talrand, sky summoner

card.name: Encrust
card.property: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Barnacles are the sea's final defense." —Garild, merfolk mage

card.name: Essence Scatter
card.property: Counter target creature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What you attempt to pull from the Æther, I can spread onto the wind." —Jace Beleren

card.name: Faerie Invaders
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Small enough to penetrate the narrowest crack in a castle wall and numerous enough to hack apart a griffin.

card.name: Fog Bank
card.property: Defender, flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Fog Bank.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The union of sea and sky makes a perfect cover." —Talrand, sky summoner

card.name: Harbor Serpent
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Harbor Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.

card.name: Hydrosurge
card.property: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Index
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What good is having all the right answers if you have them at all the wrong times?"

card.name: Jace, Memory Adept
card.property: +1: Draw a card. Target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard. 0: Target player puts the top ten cards of their library into their graveyard. −7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.

card.name: Jace's Phantasm
card.property: Flying Jace's Phantasm gets +4/+4 as long as an opponent has ten or more cards in their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the abstract memories of the Iquati, Jace found interesting ideas to improve upon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.

card.name: Master of the Pearl Trident
card.property: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the land dwellers know the coast is no longer the border between our realms. A new age of empire has begun."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The merfolk of the Pearl Trident have risen from the waves since the earliest days, at times allies to humans, other times enemies. Now their power is cresting again, and who can say which way the new tide will flow." —Kalis, Onean scholar

card.name: Mind Sculpt
card.property: Target opponent puts the top seven cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your mind was a curious mix of madness and genius. I just took away the genius." —Jace Beleren

card.name: Negate
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

card.name: Omniscience
card.property: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The things I once imagined would be my greatest achievements were only the first steps toward a future I can only begin to fathom." —Jace Beleren

card.name: Redirect
card.property: You may choose new targets for target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's actually quite simple, but since you've only recently begun to walk upright, it may take some time to explain." —Jace Beleren, to Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Rewind
card.property: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory."

card.name: Scroll Thief
card.property: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The arcane academies along the coast were powerless to protect themselves from the brazen raiders of the Kapsho Seas.

card.name: Sleep
card.property: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious." —Garild, merfolk mage

card.name: Spelltwine
card.property: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard and target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. Copy those cards. Cast the copies if able without paying their mana costs. Exile Spelltwine.

card.name: Sphinx of Uthuun
card.property: Flying When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Stormtide Leviathan
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) All lands are Islands in addition to their other types. Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.

card.name: Switcheroo
card.property: Exchange control of two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Say hello to your new friend.

card.name: Talrand, Sky Summoner
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"

card.name: Talrand's Invocation
card.property: Create two 2/2 blue Drake creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After Talrand conquered the depths of Shandalar, his ambitions drove him skyward, joined by servants whose drive and curiosity equaled his own.

card.name: Tricks of the Trade
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pathetic. You might as well have protected your treasures with a paper box and some string."

card.name: Unsummon
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not to be. That is the answer.

card.name: Vedalken Entrancer
card.property: {U}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Void Stalker
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}: Put Void Stalker and target creature on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle their libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now you see it, now you're gone.

card.name: Watercourser
card.property: {U}: Watercourser gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beware an eddy where there should be none or a stretch that flows too fast or too slow." —Old Fishbones, Martyne river guide

card.name: Welkin Tern
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It preys on other birds. And drakelings. And drakes. Pretty much anything that crosses its flight path is fair game." —Amira, skycaptain of Thune

card.name: Wind Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A smaller cousin to the dragon, drakes are often seen at the side of powerful wizards who use them as airborne eyes and ears.

card.name: Blood Reckoning
card.property: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no greater folly than standing against me." —Nicol Bolas

card.name: Bloodhunter Bat
card.property: Flying When Bloodhunter Bat enters the battlefield, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It returns eager to share the feast of blood and gore with its ghoulish master.

card.name: Bloodthrone Vampire
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What I need is your blood. What I don't need is your permission."

card.name: Cower in Fear
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will fully understand fear when you discover it is the final thing you put your faith in." —Nicol Bolas

card.name: Crippling Blight
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Still alive? No matter. I'll leave you as a warning to others who would oppose me." —Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter

card.name: Dark Favor
card.property: Enchant creature When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life. Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When he began to curse what he held holy, his strength grew unrivaled.

card.name: Diabolic Revelation
card.property: Search your library for up to X cards and put those cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are some secrets so dark no human mind should ever contain them. Interested?" —Nefarox, Overlord of Grixis

card.name: Disciple of Bolas
card.property: When Disciple of Bolas enters the battlefield, sacrifice another creature. You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lord Bolas has shown me how each miserable little life holds untold resources."

card.name: Disentomb
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I deal so often in rotting corpses that when I come across the freshly dead . . . why, it's like my birthday come early." —Nevinyrral, necromancer

card.name: Duress
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Duskmantle Prowler
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Duty-Bound Dead
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {3}{B}: Regenerate Duty-Bound Dead. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Essence Drain
card.property: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life's essence is a nectar unlike any I tasted when I lived as a mortal." —Zul Ashur, lich lord

card.name: Giant Scorpion
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its sting hurts, but death is strangely painless.

card.name: Harbor Bandit
card.property: Harbor Bandit gets +1/+1 as long as you control an Island. {1}{U}: Harbor Bandit can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He always drops a little trinket into the bay as thanks to the merfolk who taught him all his best tricks.

card.name: Knight of Infamy
card.property: Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.) Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your laws, like your bones, were made to be broken."

card.name: Liliana of the Dark Realms
card.property: +1: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. −3: Target creature gets +X/+X or -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Swamps you control. −6: You get an emblem with "Swamps you control have '{T}: Add {B}{B}{B}{B}.'"

card.name: Liliana's Shade
card.property: When Liliana's Shade enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. {B}: Liliana's Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Mark of the Vampire
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My 'condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Mind Rot
card.property: Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What a pity. You should have written it down." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Murder
card.property: Destroy target creature.

card.name: Mutilate
card.property: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's only torture if you're strong enough to survive. Otherwise, it's a simple, gruesome death. I'm happy either way."—Liliana Vess

card.name: Nefarox, Overlord of Grixis
card.property: Flying Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Nefarox, Overlord of Grixis attacks alone, defending player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Phylactery Lich
card.property: Indestructible As Phylactery Lich enters the battlefield, put a phylactery counter on an artifact you control. When you control no permanents with phylactery counters on them, sacrifice Phylactery Lich.

card.name: Public Execution
card.property: Destroy target creature an opponent controls. Each other creature that player controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though the executioner did not speak, the villagers got the message.

card.name: Ravenous Rats
card.property: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Devouring books is only the beginning. The librarian's next.

card.name: Rise from the Grave
card.property: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For my enemies, one death. For my allies, many." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Servant of Nefarox
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My cause is power, and at the altar of power I will gladly forfeit my soul."

card.name: Shimian Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Shimian Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Sign in Blood
card.property: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

card.name: Tormented Soul
card.property: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

card.name: Vampire Nighthawk
card.property: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

card.name: Vampire Nocturnus
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is black, Vampire Nocturnus and other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+1 and have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your life will set with the sun."

card.name: Veilborn Ghoul
card.property: Veilborn Ghoul can't block. Whenever a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Veilborn Ghoul from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana's voice carries far, reaching beyond the cold pall of death.

card.name: Vile Rebirth
card.property: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'Here lies our beloved Gartu, the gentlest of all men.' Ooh, I love irony." —Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared." —Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

card.name: Wit's End
card.property: Target player discards their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your pathetic ideas lie in shambles, Planeswalker. Where is your arrogant pride now?" —Nicol Bolas

card.name: Xathrid Gorgon
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) {2}{B}, {T}: Put a petrification counter on target creature. It gains defender and becomes a colorless artifact in addition to its other types. Its activated abilities can't be activated. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers." —Zul Ashur, lich lord

card.name: Arms Dealer
card.property: {1} {R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Arms Dealer deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Guaranteed to leave your enemies sufficiently stabbed, bitten, cleaved, or exploded." —Grezkrick's Emporium motto

card.name: Bladetusk Boar
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who dare stand in its path are either brave or mindless. Or in the case of goblins, both.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side." "Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?" "Yes." "So shouldn't we—" "No."

card.name: Chandra, the Firebrand
card.property: +1: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 1 damage to any target. −2: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. −6: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 6 damage to each of up to six targets.

card.name: Chandra's Fury
card.property: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I asked if they wanted to do things the easy way. I meant easy for me."

card.name: Cleaver Riot
card.property: Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

card.name: Craterize
card.property: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'Utterly' is my favorite way to destroy something." —Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Crimson Muckwader
card.property: Crimson Muckwader gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Swamp. {2}{B}: Regenerate Crimson Muckwader. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Dragon Hatchling
card.property: Flying {R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth." —Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer

card.name: Fervor
card.property: Creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We won't sit like lazy gob-slugs waiting for death to come to us. We'll bring death, shiny sharp, to our enemies." —Krenko, mob boss

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire set free is a fearsome force—destructive, merciless, always hungry. Given direction, it is much worse." —Jeflin, Vastwood shaman

card.name: Firewing Phoenix
card.property: Flying {1}{R}{R}{R}: Return Firewing Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When a phoenix nests in a volcano, we rejoice, for it means a hundred years of war." —Golmak, Keldon warlord

card.name: Flames of the Firebrand
card.property: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're in luck. I brought enough to share." —Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Furnace Whelp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Baby dragons can't figure out humans—if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

card.name: Goblin Arsonist
card.property: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

card.name: Goblin Battle Jester
card.property: Whenever you cast a red spell, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Somehow goblins found a tactical advantage by sending a clown to war.

card.name: Hamletback Goliath
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Hamletback Goliath, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you live on a giant's back, there's only one individual you'll ever need to fear." —Gaddock Teeg

card.name: Kindled Fury
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage is a dangerous weapon. Your enemies will try to use your anger against you. Use it against them first." —Ajani Goldmane

card.name: Krenko, Mob Boss
card.property: {T}: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens, where X is the number of Goblins you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He displays a perverse charisma fueled by avarice. Highly dangerous. Recommend civil sanctions." —Agmand Sarv, Azorius hussar

card.name: Krenko's Command
card.property: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins are eager to follow orders, especially when those orders involve stealing, hurting, annoying, eating, destroying, or swearing.

card.name: Magmaquake
card.property: Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where will you run when I punish you with the very ground you flee on?" —Nicol Bolas

card.name: Mark of Mutiny
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flame of anger is hard to douse once lit.

card.name: Mindclaw Shaman
card.property: When Mindclaw Shaman enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You may cast an instant or sorcery card from it without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nicol Bolas gives power to those who will abuse it most.

card.name: Mogg Flunkies
card.property: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

card.name: Reckless Brute
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Reckless Brute attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mind knows no fear, registering only the burning impulse to destroy.

card.name: Reverberate
card.property: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not bad, but I can think of a better use for that."

card.name: Rummaging Goblin
card.property: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To a goblin, value is based on the four S's: shiny, stabby, smelly, and super smelly.

card.name: Searing Spear
card.property: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

card.name: Slumbering Dragon
card.property: Flying Slumbering Dragon can't attack or block unless it has five or more +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, put a +1/+1 counter on Slumbering Dragon.

card.name: Smelt
card.property: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Looks like that wasn't darksteel after all." —Koth of the Hammer

card.name: Thundermaw Hellkite
card.property: Flying Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) When Thundermaw Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature with flying your opponents control. Tap those creatures.

card.name: Torch Fiend
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Torch Fiend: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Devils redecorate every room with fire.

card.name: Trumpet Blast
card.property: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

card.name: Turn to Slag
card.property: Turn to Slag deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it wasn't a blackened, stinking, melted abomination before, it certainly is now." —Koth of the Hammer

card.name: Volcanic Geyser
card.property: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mountain's fire surges beneath your feet, demanding release. Can you not feel it?"

card.name: Volcanic Strength
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mountains bend to no one.

card.name: Wall of Fire
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mercy is for those who keep their distance.

card.name: Wild Guess
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

card.name: Worldfire
card.property: Exile all permanents. Exile all cards from all hands and graveyards. Each player's life total becomes 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the smallest spark may set a world ablaze.

card.name: Acidic Slime
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Arbor Elf
card.property: {T}: Untap target Forest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The forest will surround you with its life if you are still and calm."

card.name: Bond Beetle
card.property: When Bond Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A beetle on your shoulder —Elvish expression meaning "a blessing of luck"

card.name: Boundless Realms
card.property: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of lands you control, and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Planeswalking cannot be taught. Either you see the doors or you do not." —Nissa Revane

card.name: Bountiful Harvest
card.property: You gain 1 life for each land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When we fail to see the beauty in every tree, we are no better than humans." —Saelia, elvish scout

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind." —Ramal, sage of Westgate

card.name: Deadly Recluse
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even dragons fear its silken strands.

card.name: Duskdale Wurm
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Elderscale Wurm
card.property: Trample When Elderscale Wurm enters the battlefield, if your life total is less than 7, your life total becomes 7. As long as you have 7 or more life, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 7 reduces it to 7 instead.

card.name: Elvish Archdruid
card.property: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He knows the name of every elf born in the last four centuries. More importantly, they all know his.

card.name: Elvish Visionary
card.property: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

card.name: Farseek
card.property: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

card.name: Flinthoof Boar
card.property: Flinthoof Boar gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain. {R}: Flinthoof Boar gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Through the smoke and flames it hunts, sniffing out the panicked and confused.

card.name: Fog
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else." —Lord Hilneth

card.name: Fungal Sprouting
card.property: Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Saprolings need only a host to feed upon. Numbers will take care of the rest." —Ghave, Guru of Spores

card.name: Garruk, Primal Hunter
card.property: +1: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. −3: Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. −6: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token for each land you control.

card.name: Garruk's Packleader
card.property: Whenever another creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He has learned much in his long years. And unlike selfish humans, he's willing to share." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Ground Seal
card.property: When Ground Seal enters the battlefield, draw a card. Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let all we have buried be buried forever." —Seton, centaur druid

card.name: Mwonvuli Beast Tracker
card.property: When Mwonvuli Beast Tracker enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with deathtouch, hexproof, reach, or trample and reveal it. Shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When your cities and trinkets crumble, only nature will remain." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Plummet
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind." —Dejara, Giltwood druid

card.name: Predatory Rampage
card.property: Creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn. Each creature your opponents control blocks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the fate of the weak to fall." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Prey Upon
card.property: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You don't find many old werewolf hunters." —Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

card.name: Primal Huntbeast
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To the unskilled, it appears as blurred patches of distorted light. Few have seen its true form." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Primordial Hydra
card.property: Primordial Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Primordial Hydra. Primordial Hydra has trample as long as it has ten or more +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Quirion Dryad
card.property: Whenever you cast a white, blue, black, or red spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Quirion Dryad.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never underestimate the ability of natural forces to adapt to unnatural influences." —Molimo, maro-sorcerer

card.name: Rancor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample. When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

card.name: Ranger's Path
card.property: Search your library for up to two Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forest can seem like a dense maze. Those who travel the canopy know otherwise.

card.name: Revive
card.property: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even what is lost beyond recall returns when coaxed by a dryad's hand.

card.name: Roaring Primadox
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're easy enough to find. Question is, are you sure you want to find one?" —Juruk, Kalonian tracker

card.name: Sentinel Spider
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your first reaction may be to stand very still and hope she didn't see you. Trust me, she did." —Endril, Kalonian naturalist

card.name: Serpent's Gift
card.property: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Venom is nature's way of redressing the imbalance between weak and mighty.

card.name: Silklash Spider
card.property: Reach {X}{G}{G}: Silklash Spider deals X damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By the time the spider comes to slurp up its dinner, its victims have been partially dissolved by acidic silk.

card.name: Spiked Baloth
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If a baloth isn't hungry, it's dead.

card.name: Thragtusk
card.property: When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life. When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Timberpack Wolf
card.property: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The need for the pack is bred in their bones. Their true strength will not show itself for any other purpose." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Titanic Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pup looked over the treetops, eyeing the man who just yesterday had kicked her. Suddenly, her hunger was infused with pure delight.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A long and difficult incision revealed that all vital organs are housed in the head, save for a long chain of stomachs, forty in all, leading from its throat to the end of the tail." —Mulak Ffar, Vastwood Biodiversity

card.name: Yeva, Nature's Herald
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) You may cast green creature spells as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can call an army to my side in the blink of an eye. Best not blink."

card.name: Yeva's Forcemage
card.property: When Yeva's Forcemage enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature can't be stopped. It rips and tears at Ravnica's tallest buildings to claim its place in the sun."

card.name: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker
card.property: +3: Destroy target noncreature permanent. −2: Gain control of target creature. −9: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

card.name: Akroma's Memorial
card.property: Creatures you control have flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, and protection from black and from red.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what." —Memorial inscription

card.name: Chronomaton
card.property: {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Chronomaton.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On the third night, the villagers destroyed their clocks. The sounds of whirring gears and chiming metal held only dread for them.

card.name: Clock of Omens
card.property: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Untap target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most clocks measure time, but a few measure everything.

card.name: Door to Nothingness
card.property: Door to Nothingness enters the battlefield tapped. {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a madman could create such a door. Only an imbecile would open it.

card.name: Elixir of Immortality
card.property: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect." —Baron Sengir

card.name: Gem of Becoming
card.property: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Gem of Becoming: Search your library for an Island card, a Swamp card, and a Mountain card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Gilded Lotus
card.property: {T}: Add three mana of any one color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Over such beauty, wars are fought. With such power, wars are won.

card.name: Jayemdae Tome
card.property: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A true scribe devotes an entire lifetime to the creation of a single volume, a masterpiece as unique as its maker.

card.name: Kitesail
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kitesailing is a way of life—and without practice, the end of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An invasion weapon of ages past, the glistening oil contained the blueprints of countless atrocities.

card.name: Primal Clay
card.property: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

card.name: Ring of Evos Isle
card.property: {2}: Equipped creature gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it's blue. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ring of Kalonia
card.property: Equipped creature has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it's green. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ring of Thune
card.property: Equipped creature has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it's white. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ring of Valkas
card.property: Equipped creature has haste. (It can attack and {T} no matter when it came under your control.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it's red. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ring of Xathrid
card.property: {2}: Regenerate equipped creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it's black. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Sands of Delirium
card.property: {X}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It counts down your last few moments of sanity.

card.name: Staff of Nin
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card. {T}: Staff of Nin deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have attuned the staff to your screams so that only I may benefit from your pain." —Volux, disciple of Nin

card.name: Stuffy Doll
card.property: Indestructible As Stuffy Doll enters the battlefield, choose a player. Whenever Stuffy Doll is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to the chosen player. {T}: Stuffy Doll deals 1 damage to itself.

card.name: Tormod's Crypt
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dominaria's most extravagant crypt nevertheless holds an empty grave.

card.name: Trading Post
card.property: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 4 life. {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Cathedral of War
card.property: Cathedral of War enters the battlefield tapped. Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Dragonskull Summit
card.property: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Drowned Catacomb
card.property: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

card.name: Glacial Fortress
card.property: Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Hellion Crucible
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{R}, {T}: Put a pressure counter on Hellion Crucible. {1}{R}, {T}, Remove two pressure counters from Hellion Crucible and sacrifice it: Create a 4/4 red Hellion creature token with haste. (It can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Reliquary Tower
card.property: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.

card.name: Rootbound Crag
card.property: Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Sunpetal Grove
card.property: Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.
